name: Flight Night's Great Journey
description:
Take a lo-fi chill trip as you use your solar powered flyer in a race to follow the sun.

This was made in 3 hours for the Friday Night Game Jam week 37 of 2020,  quite obviously a homage on Race the Sun and not nearly as well made.
The Theme was a Randomly generated Palatte, https://coolors.co/3c3744-c6c5b9-0c7489-cc5a71-de3c4b Here's mine!

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to control your flyer, Stay in the sunlight to gain fuel (blue bar)
The closer to the ground you are the faster you go but the more often you'll be in shadow.

Comment how far you get, the Leaderboard functionality didn't get finished unfortunately.
